languages.text:
The cyber-mastiff is a tough and powerful familiar. Its main purpose is to follow the designated target, be it ally or foe. The {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Apprehend!{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} allows it to chase and isolate enemies. It is especially efficient against targets using ranged weapons and psykers. While the cyber-mastiff is adjacent to the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} target, it will attack it each time the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} attacks that target. If the target decides to flee, the cyber-mastiff will try to stop it. Once the target is defeated, do not forget to give the cyber-mastiff a new order. It will be {g|f:7e87f215637d45dfb80d7291177ed6c8}waiting{/g}!
The {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} ability turns the cyber-mastiff into a dependable bodyguard. It will follow the protected ally and strike anyone who dares to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} them.
If you do not want to control the familiar directly, use {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}Battle Mode: Standby{/g} — the cyber-mastiff will strike the nearest target itself! {g|f:1bdeaab7c66c44a09357141ff127f5ba}Growl!{/g} will weaken enemies in an area, reducing their damage dealt, while {g|f:b1ad536a308a4cb49e0c1c4d31c3ee25}Bite!{/g} and {g|f:05a10418b81049198fb5d792ca346f2f}Run!{/g} provide mobility and help break the enemy lines.
languages.original_text:
Кибермастиф — мощный выносливый фамильяр. Его основное назначение — следовать за указанной целью, будь то противник или союзник. {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Способность{/g} {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Взять!{/g} позволяет ему догнать врага, создав для него определенные ограничения. Это особенно эффективно против целей с дистанционным оружием и псайкеров. Пока кибермастиф находится на соседней клетке с {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}целью захвата{/g}, он будет атаковать ее каждый раз, когда ее атакует {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g}. Если цель попробует отдалиться от кибермастифа, тот попытается ее остановить. Когда цель будет уничтожена, не забудьте дать кибермастифу новую команду. Он будет {g|f:7e87f215637d45dfb80d7291177ed6c8}ждать{/g}!
Способность {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Охранять!{/g} сделает из кибермастифа настоящего телохранителя. Он будет следовать за союзником под охраной и наказывать любого, кто совершит {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} по этому союзнику.
Если вы не хотите контролировать каждое действие фамильяра вручную, переведите его в {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}автономный режим{/g} — кибермастиф будет самостоятельно атаковать ближайшую цель! Команда {g|f:1bdeaab7c66c44a09357141ff127f5ba}Голос!{/g} ослабит врагов в области действия, уменьшив наносимый ими урон, а команды {g|f:b1ad536a308a4cb49e0c1c4d31c3ee25}Фас!{/g} и {g|f:05a10418b81049198fb5d792ca346f2f}Живее!{/g} позволят ускорить фамильяра и нарушить построение врага.

traits.locale_text:
The cyber-mastiff is a tough and powerful familiar. Its main purpose is to follow the designated target – be that an ally or a foe. The {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Apprehend!{/g} ability allows it to chase and isolate enemies. It is especially efficient against shooters and psykers. While the cyber-mastiff is adjacent to the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} target, it will attack it each time the Overseer attacks that target. If the target decides to flee, the cyber-mastiff will try to stop it. Once the target is defeated, do not forget to give the cyber-mastiff a new order. It will be {g|f:7e87f215637d45dfb80d7291177ed6c8}waiting{/g}!
The {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} ability turns the cyber-mastiff into a dependable bodyguard. It will follow the protected ally and strike anyone who dares to hit them.
If you do not want to control the familiar directly, use {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}battle mode: standby{/g} — the cyber-mastiff will find the nearest target by itself! {g|f:1bdeaab7c66c44a09357141ff127f5ba}Growl!{/g} will weaken the enemies in the area, reducing their damage dealt, while {g|f:b1ad536a308a4cb49e0c1c4d31c3ee25}Bite!{/g} and {g|f:05a10418b81049198fb5d792ca346f2f}Run!{/g} provide mobility and help to break the enemies lines.

The cyber-mastiff is a tough and powerful familiar. Its main purpose is to follow the designated target, be it ally or foe. The {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Apprehend!{/g} ability allows it to chase and isolate enemies. It is especially efficient against targets using ranged weapons and psykers. While the cyber-mastiff is adjacent to the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} target, it will attack it each time the Overseer attacks that target. If the target decides to flee, the cyber-mastiff will try to stop it. Once the target is defeated, do not forget to give the cyber-mastiff a new order. It will be {g|f:7e87f215637d45dfb80d7291177ed6c8}waiting{/g}!
The {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} ability turns the cyber-mastiff into a dependable bodyguard. It will follow the protected ally and strike anyone who dares to hit them.
If you do not want to control the familiar directly, use {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}Battle Mode: Standby{/g} — the cyber-mastiff will strike the nearest target itself! {g|f:1bdeaab7c66c44a09357141ff127f5ba}Growl!{/g} will weaken enemies in an area, reducing their damage dealt, while {g|f:b1ad536a308a4cb49e0c1c4d31c3ee25}Bite!{/g} and {g|f:05a10418b81049198fb5d792ca346f2f}Run!{/g} provide mobility and help break the enemy lines.

While the cyber-mastiff is adjacent to the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} target, it will attack it each time the Overseer attacks that target. If the target decides to flee, the cyber-mastiff will try to stop it. Once the target is defeated, do not forget to give the cyber-mastiff a new order. The {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} ability turns the cyber-mastiff into a dependable bodyguard. It will follow the protected ally and strike anyone who dares to hit them.
If you do not want to control the familiar directly, use {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}Battle Mode: Standby{/g} — the cyber-mastiff will strike the nearest target itself! {g|f:1bdeaab7c66c44a09357141ff127f5ba}Growl!{/g} will weaken enemies in an area, reducing their damage dealt, while {g|f:b1ad536a308a4cb49e0c1c4d31c3ee25}Bite!{/g} and {g|f:05a10418b81049198fb5d792ca346f2f}Run!{/g} provide mobility and help break the enemy lines.

Способность {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Охранять!{/g} сделает из кибермастифа настоящего телохранителя. Он будет следовать за союзником под охраной и наказывать любого, кто совершит попадание по этому союзнику.
Если вы не хотите контролировать каждое действие фамильяра вручную, переведите его в {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}автономный режим{/g} — кибермастиф будет самостоятельно атаковать ближайшую цель! traits.locale_text:
Der Cyber-Mastiff ist ein robuster und mächtiger Vertrauter. Seine Hauptaufgabe ist die Verfolgung des zugewiesenen feindlichen oder verbündeten Ziels. Die Fähigkeit {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Stellen!{/g} ermöglicht ihm, Gegner zu jagen und zu isolieren. Sie ist vor allem gegen Ziele mit Fernkampfwaffen und Psioniker effektiv. Befindet sich der Cyber-Mastiff neben dem {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}gestellten{/g} Ziel, greift er es jedes Mal an, wenn es der Aufseher attackiert. Ergreift das Ziel die Flucht, versucht der Cyber-Mastiff, es aufzuhalten. Denke daran, dem Cyber-Mastiff einen neuen Befehl zu erteilen, wenn das Ziel besiegt ist. Er {g|f:7e87f215637d45dfb80d7291177ed6c8}wartet{/g} darauf!
Die Fähigkeit {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Beschützen!{/g} verwandelt den Cyber-Mastiff in einen verlässlichen Leibwächter. Er folgt dem beschützten Verbündeten und attackiert jeden Angreifer.
Willst du den Vertrauten nicht direkt steuern, verwende {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}Kampfmodus: Standby{/g} – Der Cyber-Mastiff attackiert nun selbständig das nächstgelegene Ziel! {g|f:1bdeaab7c66c44a09357141ff127f5ba}Knurren!{/g} schwächt Gegner in der Umgebung und reduziert ihren Schaden. {g|f:b1ad536a308a4cb49e0c1c4d31c3ee25}Fass!{/g} und {g|f:05a10418b81049198fb5d792ca346f2f}Lauf!{/g} gewähren Mobilität und ermöglichen das Durchbrechen feindlicher Linien.

Er {g|f:7e87f215637d45dfb80d7291177ed6c8}wartet{/g} darauf!
Die Fähigkeit {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Beschützen!{/g} verwandelt den Cyber-Mastiff in einen verlässlichen Leibwächter. Er folgt dem beschützten Verbündeten und attackiert jeden Angreifer.
Willst du den Vertrauten nicht direkt steuern, verwende {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}Kampfmodus: Standby{/g} – Der Cyber-Mastiff attackiert nun selbständig das nächstgelegene Ziel! {g|f:1bdeaab7c66c44a09357141ff127f5ba}Knurren!{/g} schwächt Gegner in der Umgebung und reduziert ihren Schaden. {g|f:b1ad536a308a4cb49e0c1c4d31c3ee25}Fass!{/g} und {g|f:05a10418b81049198fb5d792ca346f2f}Lauf!{/g} gewähren Mobilität und ermöglichen das Durchbrechen feindlicher Linien.

languages.original_text:
The cyber-mastiff is a tough and powerful familiar. Its main purpose is to follow the designated target, be it ally or foe. The {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Apprehend!{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} allows it to chase and isolate enemies. It is especially efficient against targets using ranged weapons and psykers. While the cyber-mastiff is adjacent to the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} target, it will attack it each time the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} attacks that target. If the target decides to flee, the cyber-mastiff will try to stop it. Once the target is defeated, do not forget to give the cyber-mastiff a new order. It will be {g|f:7e87f215637d45dfb80d7291177ed6c8}waiting{/g}!
The {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} ability turns the cyber-mastiff into a dependable bodyguard. It will follow the protected ally and strike anyone who dares to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} them.
If you do not want to control the familiar directly, use {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}Battle Mode: Standby{/g} — the cyber-mastiff will strike the nearest target itself! {g|f:1bdeaab7c66c44a09357141ff127f5ba}Growl!{/g} will weaken enemies in an area, reducing their damage dealt, while {g|f:b1ad536a308a4cb49e0c1c4d31c3ee25}Bite!{/g} and {g|f:05a10418b81049198fb5d792ca346f2f}Run!{/g} provide mobility and help break the enemy lines.

traits.locale_text:
Le cyber-mastiff est un familier puissant et coriace dont le principal objectif est de poursuivre sa cible désignée, alliée ou ennemie. La capacité {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Appréhende !{/g} lui permet de pourchasser et d'isoler les ennemis. Il est particulièrement efficace contre les cibles équipées d'armes à distance et les psykers. Tant qu'il se trouve sur une case adjacente à la cible {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}appréhendée{/g}, il l'attaque chaque fois que le surveillant s'en prend à elle. Si elle cherche à fuir, le cyber-mastiff tentera de l'en empêcher. Une fois la cible vaincue, il s'interrompt, en {g|f:7e87f215637d45dfb80d7291177ed6c8}attente{/g} de nouvelles instructions.
La capacité {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protège !{/g} transforme le cyber-mastiff en fidèle garde du corps. Il suit alors l'allié à protéger et s'en prend à quiconque ose l'attaquer.
Si vous ne souhaitez pas contrôler directement le familier, vous pouvez activer le {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}Mode de combat : Standby{/g}, et il attaquera automatiquement la cible la plus proche de son emplacement. {g|f:1bdeaab7c66c44a09357141ff127f5ba}Grogne !{/g} affaiblit les ennemis dans une zone, réduisant les dégâts qu'ils infligent, tandis que {g|f:b1ad536a308a4cb49e0c1c4d31c3ee25}Mords !{/g} et {g|f:05a10418b81049198fb5d792ca346f2f}Fuis !{/g} accroissent sa mobilité et contribuent à disperser les lignes ennemies.

languages.text:
生化獒犬是一种强悍、凶猛的使仆，主要使命是追踪特定目标，盟友与敌人皆可。它的{g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}逮捕！{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}可以追击、孤立敌人，对使用远程武器的敌人与灵能者极为有效。当生化獒犬靠近处于{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}逮捕状态{/g}的目标时，每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}主人{/g}对目标发动攻击时，它也会同样发动攻击。如果目标打算逃跑，则生化獒犬会试图阻止目标移动。当目标被消灭时，记得为生化獒犬下达新的命令，否则它会始终处于{g|f:7e87f215637d45dfb80d7291177ed6c8}等待{/g}状态！
{g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}守护！{/g}这个能力可以让生化獒犬化身为可靠的守护者。它会始终追随被守护的盟友，反击一切胆敢{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻击{/g}该盟友的人。
如果您没有兴趣亲自控制使仆，可以使用{g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}战斗模式：自由行动{/g}。此模式下，生化獒犬会自动攻击距离最近的目标。{g|f:1bdeaab7c66c44a09357141ff127f5ba}咆哮！{/g}可以削弱目标区域内的所有敌人，降低敌人造成的伤害，而{g|f:b1ad536a308a4cb49e0c1c4d31c3ee25}撕咬！{/g}与{g|f:05a10418b81049198fb5d792ca346f2f}快跑！{/g}则可以提供机动性，迅速撕开敌方防线。

The {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Apprehend!{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} allows it to chase and isolate enemies. It is especially efficient against targets using ranged weapons and psykers. While the cyber-mastiff is adjacent to the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} target, it will attack it each time the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} attacks that target. If the target decides to flee, the cyber-mastiff will try to stop it. Once the target is defeated, do not forget to give the cyber-mastiff a new order. It will be {g|f:7e87f215637d45dfb80d7291177ed6c8}waiting{/g}!
The {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} ability turns the cyber-mastiff into a dependable bodyguard. It will follow the protected ally and strike anyone who dares to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} them.
If you do not want to control the familiar directly, use {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}Battle Mode: Standby{/g} — the cyber-mastiff will strike the nearest target itself! {g|f:1bdeaab7c66c44a09357141ff127f5ba}Growl!{/g} will weaken enemies in an area, reducing their damage dealt, while {g|f:b1ad536a308a4cb49e0c1c4d31c3ee25}Bite!{/g} and {g|f:05a10418b81049198fb5d792ca346f2f}Run!{/g} provide mobility and help break the enemy lines.

生化獒犬是一种强悍、凶猛的使仆，主要使命是追踪特定目标，盟友与敌人皆可。它的{g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}逮捕！{/g}能力可以追击、孤立敌人，对使用远程武器的敌人与灵能者极为有效。当生化獒犬靠近处于{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}逮捕状态{/g}的目标时，每当主人对目标发动攻击时，它也会同样发动攻击。如果目标打算逃跑，则生化獒犬会试图阻止目标移动。当目标被消灭时，记得为生化獒犬下达新的命令，否则它会始终处于{g|f:7e87f215637d45dfb80d7291177ed6c8}等待{/g}状态！
{g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}守护！{/g}这个能力可以让生化獒犬化身为可靠的守护者。它会始终追随被守护的盟友，反击一切胆敢攻击该盟友的人。
如果您没有兴趣亲自控制使仆，可以使用{g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}战斗模式：自由行动{/g}。此模式下，生化獒犬会自动攻击距离最近的目标。{g|f:1bdeaab7c66c44a09357141ff127f5ba}咆哮！{/g}可以削弱目标区域内的所有敌人，降低敌人造成的伤害，而{g|f:b1ad536a308a4cb49e0c1c4d31c3ee25}撕咬！{/g}与{g|f:05a10418b81049198fb5d792ca346f2f}快跑！{/g}则可以提供机动性，迅速撕开敌方防线。

languages.text:
El cibermastín es un familiar resistente y potente. Su propósito principal es seguir al objetivo designado, sea aliado o enemigo. La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}¡Apresa!{/g} le permite perseguir y aislar enemigos. Es especialmente eficaz contra objetivos con armas a distancia y psíquicos. Cuando el cibermastín está adyacente al objetivo {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apresado{/g}, atacará cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} lo ataque. Si el objetivo decide huir, el cibermastín intentará detenerlo. Cuando el objetivo caiga, no olvides dar una nueva orden al cibermastín. ¡Estará {g|f:7e87f215637d45dfb80d7291177ed6c8}a la espera{/g}!
La capacidad {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}¡Protege!{/g} convierte al cibermastín en un guardaespaldas de confianza. Seguirá al aliado protegido y {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}atacará{/g} a quien se atreva a golpearle.
¡Si no quieres controlar al familiar directamente, usa {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}Modo de combate: A la espera{/g} para que el cibermastín ataque al objetivo más cercano sin necesidad de órdenes! {g|f:1bdeaab7c66c44a09357141ff127f5ba}¡Gruñe!{/g} debilita a los enemigos en una zona, reduciendo el daño que infligen, mientras que {g|f:b1ad536a308a4cb49e0c1c4d31c3ee25}¡Muerde!{/g} y {g|f:05a10418b81049198fb5d792ca346f2f}¡Corre!{/g} le proporcionan movilidad y le permiten romper las filas enemigas.

It is especially efficient against targets using ranged weapons and psykers. While the cyber-mastiff is adjacent to the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} target, it will attack it each time the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} attacks that target. It will be {g|f:7e87f215637d45dfb80d7291177ed6c8}waiting{/g}!
The {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} ability turns the cyber-mastiff into a dependable bodyguard. It will follow the protected ally and strike anyone who dares to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} them.
If you do not want to control the familiar directly, use {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}Battle Mode: Standby{/g} — the cyber-mastiff will strike the nearest target itself! {g|f:1bdeaab7c66c44a09357141ff127f5ba}Growl!{/g} will weaken enemies in an area, reducing their damage dealt, while {g|f:b1ad536a308a4cb49e0c1c4d31c3ee25}Bite!{/g} and {g|f:05a10418b81049198fb5d792ca346f2f}Run!{/g} provide mobility and help break the enemy lines.

traits.locale_text:
サイバーマスチフは頑強で強力なファミリアーである。その主な目的は、味方であれ敵であれ、指定されたターゲットを追跡することである。{g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}捕まえろ！{/g}アビリティにより、敵を追跡し孤立させることができる。特に遠隔武器を使用するターゲットや異能者に対して効果的である。サイバーマスチフが{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕縛された{/g}ターゲットに隣接している間、監督官がそのターゲットを攻撃するたびに同時に攻撃する。ターゲットが逃亡を試みる場合、サイバーマスチフは阻止にかかる。ターゲットを倒したら、サイバーマスチフは{g|f:7e87f215637d45dfb80d7291177ed6c8}待機{/g}状態になるため、新しい命令を与えることを忘れないように。
{g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}守れ！{/g}アビリティは、サイバーマスチフを信頼できるボディーガードに変える。保護する味方を追従し、その味方を攻撃しようとする者を攻撃する。
直接制御したくない場合は、{g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}戦闘モード：スタンバイ{/g}を使用すれば、サイバーマスチフが自ら最も近いターゲットを攻撃する。{g|f:1bdeaab7c66c44a09357141ff127f5ba}吠えろ！{/g}は範囲内の敵を弱体化し、与えるダメージを減少させ、{g|f:b1ad536a308a4cb49e0c1c4d31c3ee25}噛みつけ！{/g}と{g|f:05a10418b81049198fb5d792ca346f2f}走れ！{/g}は機動力を提供し、敵の戦線を突破するのに役立つ。

サイバーマスチフは頑強で強力なファミリアーである。その主な目的は、味方であれ敵であれ、指定されたターゲットを追跡することである。{g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}捕まえろ！{/g}アビリティにより、敵を追跡し孤立させることができる。特に遠隔武器を使用するターゲットや異能者に対して効果的である。サイバーマスチフが{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕縛された{/g}ターゲットに隣接している間、監督官がそのターゲットを攻撃するたびに同時に攻撃する。ターゲットが逃亡を試みる場合、サイバーマスチフは阻止にかかる。ターゲットを倒したら、サイバーマスチフは{g|f:7e87f215637d45dfb80d7291177ed6c8}待機{/g}状態になるため、新しい命令を与えることを忘れないように。
{g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}守れ！{/g}アビリティは、サイバーマスチフを信頼できるボディーガードに変える。保護する味方を追従し、その味方を攻撃しようとする者を攻撃する。
直接制御したくない場合は、{g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}戦闘モード：スタンバイ{/g}を使用すれば、サイバーマスチフが自ら最も近いターゲットを攻撃する。{g|f:1bdeaab7c66c44a09357141ff127f5ba}吠えろ！{/g}は範囲内の敵を弱体化し、与えるダメージを減少させ、{g|f:b1ad536a308a4cb49e0c1c4d31c3ee25}噛みつけ！{/g}と{g|f:05a10418b81049198fb5d792ca346f2f}走れ！{/g}は機動力を提供し、敵の戦線を突破するのに役立つ。

languages.text:
Siber mastif, dayanıklı ve kuvvetli bir iyedir. Ana amacı, ister dost ister düşman olsun belirlenen hedefi takip etmektedir. {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Göz Hapsine Al!{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g}, bir düşmanı kovalayıp onu diğerlerinden ayırarak yalnız bırakmasını sağlar. Menzilli silah kullanan hedeflere veya ruhsezerlere karşı özellikle etkilidir. Siber mastif, {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}göz hapsindeki{/g} hedefin bitişiğindeyken {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g} o hedefe her saldırdığında siber mastif de aynı hedefe saldırır. Hedef, kaçmaya kalkarsa siber mastif onu durdurmaya çalışır. Hedef alt edildiğinde siber mastife yeni emir vermeyi unutma. Emir alana dek {g|f:7e87f215637d45dfb80d7291177ed6c8}Bekleyiş{/g} durumuna girecektir!
{g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Koru!{/g} kabiliyeti, siber mastifi güvenilir bir korumaya çevirir. Koruduğu dost birimin peşinden giderek dost birime {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurmaya{/g} kalkan her kim varsa saldıracaktır.
Bu iyeyi doğrudan kontrol etmek istemiyorsan {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}Savaş Modu: Otonom{/g} kabiliyetini kullan. Siber mastif, otomatikman en yakındaki hedefe saldıracaktır! {g|f:1bdeaab7c66c44a09357141ff127f5ba}Hırla!{/g}, bir alandaki düşmanları zayıflatıp verecekleri hasarı düşürürken {g|f:b1ad536a308a4cb49e0c1c4d31c3ee25}Isır!{/g} ve {g|f:05a10418b81049198fb5d792ca346f2f}Koş!{/g} ise hareket kabiliyeti sağlayarak düşman hatlarını yarmaya yardımcı olur.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-mastiff is a tough and powerful familiar. Its main purpose is to follow the designated target, be it ally or foe. The {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Apprehend!{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} allows it to chase and isolate enemies. It is especially efficient against targets using ranged weapons and psykers. While the cyber-mastiff is adjacent to the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} target, it will attack it each time the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} attacks that target. If the target decides to flee, the cyber-mastiff will try to stop it. Once the target is defeated, do not forget to give the cyber-mastiff a new order. It will be {g|f:7e87f215637d45dfb80d7291177ed6c8}waiting{/g}!
The {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} ability turns the cyber-mastiff into a dependable bodyguard. It will follow the protected ally and strike anyone who dares to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} them.
If you do not want to control the familiar directly, use {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}Battle Mode: Standby{/g} — the cyber-mastiff will strike the nearest target itself! {g|f:1bdeaab7c66c44a09357141ff127f5ba}Growl!{/g} will weaken enemies in an area, reducing their damage dealt, while {g|f:b1ad536a308a4cb49e0c1c4d31c3ee25}Bite!{/g} and {g|f:05a10418b81049198fb5d792ca346f2f}Run!{/g} provide mobility and help break the enemy lines.

traits.locale_text:
Siber mastif, dayanıklı ve kuvvetli bir iyedir. Ana amacı, ister dost ister düşman olsun belirlenen hedefi takip etmektedir. {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Göz Hapsine Al!{/g} kabiliyeti, bir düşmanı kovalayıp onu diğerlerinden ayırarak yalnız bırakmasını sağlar. Menzilli silah kullanan hedeflere veya ruhsezerlere karşı özellikle etkilidir. Siber mastif, {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}göz hapsindeki{/g} hedefin bitişiğindeyken Gözetmen o hedefe her saldırdığında siber mastif de aynı hedefe saldırır. Hedef, kaçmaya kalkarsa siber mastif onu durdurmaya çalışır. Hedef alt edildiğinde siber mastife yeni emir vermeyi unutma. Emir alana dek {g|f:7e87f215637d45dfb80d7291177ed6c8}Bekleyiş{/g} durumuna girecektir!
{g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Koru!{/g} kabiliyeti, siber mastifi güvenilir bir korumaya çevirir. Koruduğu dost birimin peşinden giderek dost birime vurmaya kalkan her kim varsa saldıracaktır.
Bu iyeyi doğrudan kontrol etmek istemiyorsan {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}Savaş Modu: Otonom{/g} kabiliyetini kullan. Bu iyeyi doğrudan kontrol etmek istemiyorsan {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}Savaş Modu: Otonom{/g} kabiliyetini kullan. Siber mastif, otomatikman en yakındaki hedefe saldıracaktır! {g|f:1bdeaab7c66c44a09357141ff127f5ba}Hırla!{/g}, bir alandaki düşmanları zayıflatıp verecekleri hasarı düşürürken {g|f:b1ad536a308a4cb49e0c1c4d31c3ee25}Isır!{/g} ve {g|f:05a10418b81049198fb5d792ca346f2f}Koş!{/g} ise hareket kabiliyeti sağlayarak düşman hatlarını yarmaya yardımcı olur.
